text: long int min ( long int * a , int n ) { long int k = a [ 0 ] ; for ( int i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] < k ) { k = a [ i ] ; } } return k ; } int main ( void ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t > 0 ) { int n ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; long int a [ n ] ; for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%ld" , & a [ i ] ) ; } long int m = min ( a , n ) ; long long int k = ( n - 1 ) * m ; printf ( "%lld\n" , k ) ; t -- ; } return 0 ; }
